WEBGL_color_buffer_float.summary: The WEBGL_color_buffer_float extension is part of the WebGL API and adds the ability to render to 32-bit floating-point color buffers.

remarks.para: WebGL extensions are available using the method. For more information, see also Using Extensions in the WebGL tutorial.

blockquote.para: This extension is available to {{domxref("WebGLRenderingContext", "WebGL 1", "", 1)}} contexts only. For {{domxref("WebGL2RenderingContext", "WebGL 2", "", 1)}}, use the extension.
The extension implicitly enables this extension.
